0.6.0:
---Date: 31/7/2021

> **Added**:
**;status**
Description: Sends a message containing different information regarding the bot's connection.
Usage: ;status
Category: other
Cooldown: 10s

**;events**
Description: Directly connected to the `;host` command. It shows you what events are being hosted using the first command. Current max amount is 2.
Usage: ;events
Category: ms
Cooldown: 5s

**;news**
Description: Shows you the latest update for the bot.
Usage: ;news
Category: other
 Cooldown: s3

**Points logs**
Description: Every commands that modifies other users' points will be logged in this new logging channel.
Usage: Accessible through `;logs`

**Events logs**
Description: Every Interaction with the command `;host` will be logged in this logging channel.
Usage: Accessible through `;logs`


> **Changed:**
*Changed some texts in the `;help` command.
 *Changed the way `;host` work. Now has a maximum of 2 events and every usage of the command will be logged in a new log called "events logs" ( accessible through the `;logs` command )
 *Changed some texts in `;logs`   `;server` `;help`
*If you want to use points, you will not have to manually enable them using `;points-enable` any more. In fact, the commands `;points-enable` and `;opoints-enable` have been removed due to it being automated.
*`;ping` is removed and replaced with `;status`
*`;help` is now easier to interact with and invites you to our hub server.
 *Changed some texts in `;sync`
*Minor bug fixes related to the console spamming false errors.
0.6.1:
---Date: 6/8/2021

> **Added:**
**;welcome-message**
Description: Changes the messages sent by the bot when a member joins/leaves the server.
Usage: ;welcome-message
Category: config
Cooldown: 10s


> **Changed:**
*Improved the channel updates logging.
*Changed the way `;logs` and `;server` work. Now they will show you a menu of options to choose from to edit instead of asking you directly asking to change without explain.*Added global command cooldowns (only for `;server` and `;logs` since they are the biggest commands in the bot) to prevent multiple requests at the same time.
*The cooldown message will show you how much time remaining instead of showing you the cooldown time.
*Renamed the `ms` category to `tsu`
*Renamed the `warn logs` to `moderations logs` and more logging triggers will be added in the future.
*`;news` now has a cooldown of 30 seconds and the message sent by the bot will get deleted after 2 minutes to prevent flooding.
*`;mute` now skips the server booster role instead of giving up entirely and not muting at all.
*Some general text changes.
*`;news` now links to the github repository of the bot.
*The bot now changes its status to different sentences every 30 minutes 👀
0.6.2:
---Date: 9/8/2021

> **Added:**
*No new features were introduced.


> **Changed:**
*If you try to run a whitelisted command and you don't have the permission needed, the bot will tell you that you are missing that permission
*When a member updates, all of the changed roles will be mentioned (instead of only one before)
*`;mute` will now completely bypass server booster role, bot roles and @ everyone role.
*You now cannot mute a person that is already muted using `;mute`.
*[reason] is now an optional argument in `;ban`
*[reason] is now an optional argument in `;unban`
*[reason] is now an optional argument in `;kick`
*[reason] is now an optional argument in `;mute`
*[time] is now an optional argument in `;mute` (default is 30 minutes)
*[time] is now defaulted to 1 day in `;ban`
*`;rick-roll` has now different messages and tricks :eyes: 



**Changed to disord.js V13.**
This means that everything in the bot has been changed and edited to fit the new version of discord.js. It's very possible that you encounter bugs, so if you do, please inform the developer "Crazy4k#0091" ASAP.
This also means that new discord features will be added, like slash commands, threads, stickers and whatnot.
I will spend the next few days fixing any leftover issues to prepare for new features back again.
0.6.3:
---Date: 18/8/2021

> **Added:**
*No new features were introduced.


> **Changed:**
*Added a cooldown for all commands that will be executed to matter what the results of the command were. Length: 2 seconds.
*Changed some texts.
*`;rick-roll` doesn't send messages to bots anymore.
*Minor bug fixes
0.6.4:
---Date 30/8/2021

> **Added**:
*`;pointsbatch-add`:
Adds points to users in batch mode. Up to possible 25 users per batch.
Example: `;pointsbatch-add @user amount reason | @user amount reason | @user amount reason`
*`;pointsbatch-remove`:
Removes points from users in batch mode. Up to possible 25 users per batch.
Example: `;pointsbatch-remove @user amount reason | @user amount reason | @user amount reason`
*A very new and exciting system called.... Points promotion!!!
From now on, if an admin in the server added roles to the bot that can be earned using points, the bot will automatically give the roles to people when they reach that amount of points.
It can edited using the new `;rewards-set` command that is only for admins to use



Changed:
*All points command will increase in cooldown due to the fact that all of them will be more resource extensive.
*Changed some texts.
 *Using a new line "\n" will function exactly like a spcae bar from now on instead of being treated as a character
*It's no longer possible to go below 0 points
0.6.5:
---Date 31/8/2021

> **Added**:
*`;slowmode`:
A new way for mod to change the slowmode of any channel to any time from 1 second - 6 hours.
 Requires channel managing permissions.



Changed:
*`;help` now shows command aliases and the required permission to the a command.
*`;copy`, `;sudo`, `;rr` now have a server wide cooldown applied to them(this is to prevent spam).
*All commands in the bot can now accept a nickname/tag as an argument instead of a ping or id as a user.
Example: ";avatar user" works exactly like ";avatar @user" or ";avatar 881885038407458846"
*Minor fixes to the last update.
0.6.6:
---Date 18/9/2021

> **Added**:
*`;AoSinTSU`:
A command that searches through all current AoS and KoS groups for branch members like RA, Mili and CPSU.
This is useful for TSU HIcoms who want to enforce the "Membership of an Illegal Organisation" rule.

*`;raiders`:
A way for you to see AoS/KoS raiders who are online at the moment. Works similarly to a tracker.
**Only shows those who are playing ms1 and have their joins set to "everyone can join"**

*Some commands will now be executable in DMs with the bot.



Changed:
*All points commands have increased 2 seconds in cool down.
*Changed the way the bot caches data.
*Using `;mute`,`;ban`, `;kick`, `;unban`, `;slowmode`, and `;unmute` will now be logged in moderation logs that can be found in `;logs`
*The bot now reports errors privately to the developer so they can be tracked quickly and get fixed.
*The bot is now on a new host which means very stable run time.
*Fixed an issue regarding the points promotion system giving max role people roles over and over again.
*Fixed many small issues
*Some text changes
*;SUS
 i forgot the rest ☠
0.6.7:
---Date 1/10/2021

> **Added**:
***Raider tracker :eye:**:
A new way to track raiders with an AoS/KoS tag when they join MS1 or 2. It uses Roblox API and tracks their joins to MS1 and 2 only , so it doesn't violate any ToS. You can enable it in your servers now with the new `;trackers` command. (To set up a rank, simply create a role with the name "raider_pings")

If you want to know how many raiders are currently online, you can do so with the `;raiders` command.



Changed:
*Added a `Roblox` category including all the Roblox related commands.
*Changed/removed some aliases from some commands.
*`;AoSinTSU` is much more faster now.
0.6.7.1:
---Date 4/10/2021


> **Changed:**
*Changed some command descriptions that were outdated.
*Renamed a command to `;dice`
*Decreased some command cool down timers that were too long for no reason.


> **Fixed**:
*Fixed a bug in tracker that was sending too many messages, that  continuously crashed the bot whenever it booted.
*Fixed a bug that resulted in the bot sending messages that were above the limit, which resulted in the bot crashing.
*(Hopefully) fixed a bug with `;AoSinTSU` that crashed the bot.
0.6.8:
---Date 10/10/2021

> **Added:**
*Added `;dog`, a similar command to `;cat` but with dogs because why not.
*Added `[Tнe Iппeя Ciяcle]` to the tracker because I forgor:skull: to add it before.
*Added the following gamepasses to the tracker:
   MS 2: AK-47,  Clearance 3,  Clearance 4, Colt 1911, Desert Eagle, M1A1
    MS 1:  Starter Pack> **Changed:**

*The text between whenever a raider joins and switches server has been unified.
*You can change the prefix from the `;server` command.
*Removed the very unused officer points.
 *Changed some texts in some commands.
*Changed some command cool down timers for some commands.
*Changed the some internal stuff in the bot that would enable me to add slash commands later.


> **Fixed**:
*Fixed a glitch that caused the bot to crash whenever certain messages were deleted.
*Fixed a glitch that caused the bot to crash in the raider tracker.
0.6.9:
---Date 22/10/2021

> **Added:**
*Added `;check`, a command that lets you see the soviet profile, raiding power, and lebles of any player.
*Added the `custom raider tracker`, which enables you to choose specific aos/kos groups to track. You can modify which groups to track using `;trackers groups`. However, if you choose more than one group, it will cause duplicate pings. The old tracker didn't change.
> **Changed:**

*You can no longer execute moderation commands on other moderators.(This includes yourself lol)
*You can no longer execute a command if the bot doesn't have enough permissions to execute it successfully.(This only applies if the bot doesn't have admin permission.)
*You can no longer use nickname as an argument for commands.(You can't use "crazy4k" instead of "@crazy4k#0091" anymore)
*Logs will not work if the bot doesn't have admin permission.


> **Fixed**:
*Fixed some errors and made the bot more careful whenever handling events.
0.6.9.1:
---Date 24/10/2021

> **Added:**
*Added `;verify`, a more direct and clean way for you to link your Roblox and discord account together using Rover.
*You can now change the default embed color that appears on the left side of embeds using `;server color`

> **Changed:**

*Added the following gamepasses to the trackers and `;check`:
M16, Special forces, Famas, Flame thrower, Tommy Gun, M4A1, Alien Pulse Rifle, Alien Energy Sword, Alien Blaster, Egg Gift, Gingerbread Gun and Christmas RPG
*Changed the timestamps that appear in logs from normal text ones to discord styled ones. Exapmle: <t:1635082778:R> 
*Now, the raider power calculation gives you 1 power if you are in a branch or division
*Added Biopreparat as well as some extra lebels to `;check`


> **Fixed**:
*Small bug fix.

0.6.9.3:
---Date 06/11/2021

> **Added:**
*Added [The Soviet Aristocracy](https://www.roblox.com/groups/4804809), [The Soviet Union](https://www.roblox.com/groups/4800484), [IAD](https://www.roblox.com/groups/7036991), [V&K Moderation Team](https://www.roblox.com/groups/7036991) and [V&K Industries](https://www.roblox.com/groups/6066453) as noteable groups to the ;check command

0.7.0:
---Date 18/12/2021

> **Added:**
*Added [Phoenix](https://www.roblox.com/groups/4291835/unnamed#!/about), [Monarch](https://www.roblox.com/groups/5157127) and a `is REDACTED` tag to the `;check command`
*Added a `;purge` command that deletes the given amount of message that are younger than 14 days (Restricted to those with message managing perms)

**Converted all commands in the bot to SLASH COMMANDS!!!** You can now run all the commands in the bot using the / prefix!

*Added an `;invite` command that lets you invite the bot to your server.
> **Changed:**

*Some minor text changes to the tracker and other commands.
*Removed the `;nickname` command because it was useless.
*`;slowmode` is now used to see the slowmode of a chat, but only people with message managing perms, AKA mods, can use it to change the slowmode
*Added a "Joined at" time in the trackers.
*Changed the purpose of `;prefix` and made it so that it only shows the prefix of a server. To change it, refer to the `;server` command.
> **Fixes:**

*Fixed a bug that caused the bot to crash when doing the `;event-role` commmand
*Fixed an issue that caused the bot to crash when doing the `;mute` command under some conditions
0.8.0:
---Date 1/1/2022 Happy new year :confetti_ball:

> **Added:**

* Big raids detector that scans servers and notifies you for big raids in MS
*Added Krampus gamepass
*`;update` and `;roblox` that allow you to have nicknames from roblox and a verifed role
*`;remindme` and `;reminders`

 > **Changed:**

*Removed the custom raider tracker and all of its settings
* Improved moderation and logging features to include more logging events
*`;mute` now uses the timeout feature instead of removing roles.

 > **Fixes:**

*Added an anti-crash system that prevents the bot from crashing*Fixed a ton of issues
0.9.0:
---Date 8/1/2022 

> **Added:**

* **Group BINDS!!**: You can now link up to 10 groups with their roles to your discord server. Each roblox role can be linked with 5 Discord roles to give maximum customizability with your rank structure. You can access the group binds using the `;binds` or **`/binds`** command.

*The big raids tracker has been moved to a separate channel. You can change it now using the `;tracker raids` command
*Fun command: `;owofy`

> **Changed:**

*Deleted the ;rickroll command
*Deleted the ;dog command
*Small text changes

> **Fixes:**

*Fixed an issue where the tracker wouldn't send a message when a raider left in the raider tracker
*Fixed a ton of issues with the raider tracker
*Many bug fixes
0.9.1:
---Date 16/1/2022 

> **Added:**

* `;embed` and `/embed`: A way for admins to create and send Discord embeds using CrazyBot. Use the `;` prefix to create the embed using JSON data. Use the `/` prefix to create it in a simple way.
 

 > **Changed:**

*Raider tracker update timer increased from 2 minutes to 3.5 minutes.
*Big raids detector now updates the severity 
*All commands that repeat what the user says (`;owofy` or `;copy`) will now avoid the @ character. This means that `;owofy @mod` won't ping the @mod role.
*The raider tracker will now send multiple embeds in the same message instead of multiple messages. This will decrease Discord spam and ping spam. This also means that if multiple people join **at the same time**, the bot will only ping once instead of a ping for each user. 
*Added more command aliases for easier command finding
*The `;binds` command now shows you the roles names when you do the view option
*Improved the `;update` command to be more efficient and faster

> **Fixes:**

*Fixed an issue where the bot would still show commands that have been deleted.
*Fixed an issue with the raids detector where it would show a raid even though only one person is in the server
*Fixed an issue where the bot wouldn't delete server data properly when a server kicked the bot and therefore cause and error
*Other smaller bug fixes that aren't worth mentioning.
0.9.2:
---Date 12/2/2022 

> **Added:**

* `;gamepasses`: A way to show the power of each gamepass in both MS1 and 2


> **Changed:**

*Raider tracker time from 3.5 minutes to 4.5 minutes. Yet again, fetching the online data of 1.5k+ people at the same time too frequently is dangerous considering it might get the bot IP-banned.
*Changed some text and structure of the `;check` command. Now, there are different embed colors now.
*More progress being made on the background checker.
0.9.3:

> **Changed:**

*Removed the developed by Crazy4k#0091 watermark
*Added TSI to the raider tracker
